title: JLR reports best-ever sales at 3,582 units in Apr-Dec period
description: Luxury automaker Jaguar Land Rover reported record sales of 3,582 units for the nine months ending December 31, 2023, a 93% YoY increase compared to the April-December period of the last fiscal. The Range Rover and Defender led with a 250% increase, contributing to over 75% of the current order book.
